text: The Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue is published every year by American magazine Sports Illustrated and has female fashion models, celebrities and athletes wearing swimwear in many areas around the world. It was first published in 1964. It is said that it helped make the bikini, invented in 1946, popular. Since 1964, the issue had been published every February, but starting in 2019, the issue was made available in May. ==References== Category:Sports media
title: Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue
